hero.headline: The Complete
hero.description: Four integrated layers that work together to create a complete, sovereign digital infrastructure. Each layer builds on the one below, creating a unified platform that works anywhere.

layers.name: Applications
layers.description: Three integrated applications that provide the user interface to the TrueLeap platform. Built offline-first, they sync when connectivity is available.

products.name: Leapspace
products.desc: Collaboration workspace with documents, messaging, and video

products.name: Digital Twin
products.desc: Real-time monitoring and visualization of infrastructure

layers.name: Edge AI Engine
layers.description: Machine learning models that run locally on edge nodes. Process data, make decisions, and learn patterns without cloud connectivity.

products.name: Local Inference
products.desc: Run ML models on-device with sub-100ms latency

products.name: Federated Learning
products.desc: Train models across nodes without sharing raw data

layers.name: Network Layer
layers.description: Self-healing mesh networks that route data efficiently between nodes. Integrate with satellite backhaul for global connectivity when needed.

products.name: Mesh Protocol
products.desc: Dynamic routing that adapts to network conditions

products.name: Satellite Backhaul
products.desc: LEO satellite integration for global reach

layers.name: Physical Infrastructure
layers.description: Ruggedized edge nodes powered by solar energy. Designed to operate in extreme temperatures, humidity, and dust conditions.

products.name: Edge Node
products.desc: ARM-based compute with 1TB storage, < 2W power draw

designPrinciples.title: Offline-First
designPrinciples.description: Every component is designed to work without internet connectivity. Sync when available, function always.

designPrinciples.title: Sovereign by Default
designPrinciples.description: Data stays local unless explicitly shared. No cloud dependencies, no external data flows.

designPrinciples.title: Solar-Powered
designPrinciples.description: Designed for < 2W average power consumption. Run indefinitely on small solar panels.

designPrinciples.title: Self-Healing
designPrinciples.description: Mesh networks automatically route around failures. No single point of failure.

layerIntegration.title: Physical Foundation
layerIntegration.description: Ruggedized hardware that operates on minimal power in extreme conditions.

layerIntegration.title: Connectivity Fabric
layerIntegration.description: Mesh networking and satellite backhaul enable nodes to communicate.

layerIntegration.title: Local Intelligence
layerIntegration.description: ML models run locally and learn across the network via federated learning.

layerIntegration.title: User Experience
layerIntegration.description: Three integrated applications designed for offline-first operation.

cta.headline: Dive deeper into each layer
cta.description: Explore the technical details of each component in our documentation, or contact our team for a detailed architecture discussion.
